Reviews.Title: Widest angle outdoor Lorex cam
Reviews.Author: Andrew D. Rodney
Reviews.Content: I wanted something really wide for an outdoor dog run, this fit the bill. Well constructed (Metal), easy to install. Has been working fine for months but it will be interesting to see how it goes though winter in Santa Fe.

Reviews.Title: Great security Camera
Reviews.Author: Brian W. Conley
Reviews.Content: Have already set up four of these cameras. They have great quality. I love the fact that I can focus them using the small screws. It really helps to fine tune the picture. I have run these directly to a DVD recorder to record meetings with. I have also connected them to a security system to monitor the room if I need to.

Reviews.Title: Great, Well Made
Reviews.Author: Kn
Reviews.Content: This item is very well designed and made.  Worth the extra money to get a durable camera, high quality.Great item, well packed, great shipping.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Alex Fay
Reviews.Content: I have a lorex camera system, just need a wide angle it has a great picture. Great system would highly recommend

Reviews.Title: its great
Reviews.Author: TONY SCHOLLAR
Reviews.Content: my second one purcahsed gonna get more love it awesome quality, perfect size too amazon is cheaper than the rest to save money

Reviews.Title: Works great but ....
Reviews.Author: Dre
Reviews.Content: One week after installation there is a line that appears straight down the screen on the channel that this camera is assigned to. Maybe it a factory default. This is very annoying but i dont have the time to go through the headache of returning it because i live outside  the US. I would either have to deal with it or purchase another one at a later date
